name: (RELEASE) PixelOS 8
description:
PixelOS 8 is the 8th major version in the series. It's the sequel to PixelOS GD / SyntrennaOS. It went from a simple Minecraft computer build to then on Scratch, then to this from late-2020 to now. It has been completely re-written and re-built from scratch in Godot 4x.

Current Version: 1.0.3

Features:

  1. Progress Saving.
  2. Exporting wdoc files as TXT files.
  3. Custom profile picture and wallpaper.
  4. Create .file, .wdoc, .png, .audio, and .video documents.
  5. Listen to your own music.
  6. Watch your own videos.
  7. See all your save data in Terminal. Type "savedata" in terminal to see it.

PixelOS 8 is 100% open source. You can find the repository here: https://github.com/PixelGamer6632/PixelOS-8

GameJolt page: https://gamejolt.com/games/pixelos8/797608
